entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
